Uses of Class
mklab.JGNN.nn.Loss

Packages that use Loss
Package
Description
mklab.JGNN.adhoc
Contains classes that simplify data loading, model building, and training.
mklab.JGNN.nn
Implements neural networks components that are combined to define GNNs or other types of machine learning models.
mklab.JGNN.nn.loss
Contains classes for instantiating loss function.
mklab.JGNN.nn.loss.report
Contains losses that wrap other losses and augment their numeric computations with live reporting of the training status.

    Subclasses of Loss in mklab.JGNN.nn.loss
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    Accuracy
    Implements an accuracy Loss of row-by-row comparisons.
    class 
    BinaryCrossEntropy
    Implements a binary cross-entropy Loss.
    For more than one output dimensions use CategoricalCrossEntropy
    class 
    CategoricalCrossEntropy
    Implements a categorical cross-entropy Loss.
    For binary classification of one output use BinaryCrossEntropy.

    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    VerboseLoss
    Implements a Loss that wraps other losses and outputs their value during training to an output stream (to System.out by default).
